nio/Reduce.description: Computes some arithmetic information about groups of signals.

group_by.title: Group By
group_by.description: Attribute to group signals by. A different output signal will be produced for each group.

value.title: Reduce Input Value
value.description: The value for each signal to use in the computations.

default.description: Any list of signals with numeric values.
The computed sum, average, count, minimum, and maximum for the list of values specified.

groups.description: Displays the current groupings of signals.

nio/ReduceStream.description: Computes some arithmetic information about a streams of data and notifies the computations on an interval basis.

averaging_interval.title: Averaging Interval
averaging_interval.description: What period of time to compute the averages/min/max/etc for. This is a 'trailing' field, so setting it to 24 hours will always notify information about the **trailing** 24 hours.

backup_interval.title: Backup Interval
backup_interval.description: Period at which stream states are backed up to disk using persistance.

group_by.title: Group By
group_by.description: Attribute to group signals by. A different output signal will be produced for each group.

load_from_persistence.title: Load from Persistence?
load_from_persistence.description: If true, the previous state of the stream/interval is loaded upon block restart.

report_interval.title: Report Interval
report_interval.description: How often to notify signals from this block. Note that signals are not notified based on incoming signals, but rather this interval.

value.title: Reduce Input Value
value.description: The value for each signal to use in the computations.

default.description: Any list of signals with numeric values.
The computed sum, average, count, minimum, and maximum for the incoming data stream over the specified interval.

groups.description: Displays the current groupings of signals.
